name: Warigami (thetylerace13)
description:
Game by Clumsy Order.

Keyboard controls:

Pitch - S/W

Roll - A/D

Yaw - Q/E

Fire - Space

Switch target - LShift

Speed - R/F

Reset - Backspace

Xbox One controls:

Pitch - Left thumbstick up/down

Roll - Left thumbstick left/right

Yaw - LB/RB

Fire - A

Switch Target - Y

Speed - RT/LT

Reset - Option (Start)
